timeline.bodyText:
I think only the currently elected master should show the total number of unassigned shards.
If we do this for each eligible master node then we'd have eligible_master_nodes * unassigned_shards number of unassigned shards.
Update
Looks like the implementation handles it correctly - but the docs here can be a bit misleading?
